sub_questions.question: মান নির্ণয় কর: sin ⁡ 7 π 3 cos ⁡ ( − 13 π 6 ) + cos ⁡ 5 π 3 sin ⁡ ( − 11 π 6 ) \sin\frac{7\pi}{3}\cos\left(-\frac{13\pi}{6}\right) + \cos\frac{5\pi}{3}\sin\left(-\frac{11\pi}{6}\right) sin 3 7 π ​ cos ( − 6 13 π ​ ) + cos 3 5 π ​ sin ( − 6 11 π ​ )
sub_questions.explanation: প্রদত্ত রাশি = sin ⁡ 7 π 3 cos ⁡ ( − 13 π 6 ) + cos ⁡ 5 π 3 sin ⁡ ( − 11 π 6 ) = \sin \frac{7\pi}{3} \cos \left(-\frac{13\pi}{6}\right) + \cos \frac{5\pi}{3} \sin \left(-\frac{11\pi}{6}\right) = sin 3 7 π ​ cos ( − 6 13 π ​ ) + cos 3 5 π ​ sin ( − 6 11 π ​ ) = sin ⁡ 7 π 3 cos ⁡ 13 π 6 − cos ⁡ 5 π 3 sin ⁡ 11 π 6 = \sin \frac{7\pi}{3} \cos \frac{13\pi}{6} - \cos \frac{5\pi}{3} \sin \frac{11\pi}{6} = sin 3 7 π ​ cos 6 13 π ​ − cos 3 5 π ​ sin 6 11 π ​ [ ∴ cos ⁡ ( − A ) = cos ⁡ A  এবং  sin ⁡ ( − A ) = − sin ⁡ A ] [\therefore \cos(-A) = \cos A \text{ এবং } \sin(-A) = -\sin A] [ ∴ cos ( − A ) = cos A   এবং   sin ( − A ) = − sin A ] = sin ⁡ ( 2 π + π 3 ) cos ⁡ ( 2 π + π 6 ) − cos ⁡ ( 2 π − π 3 ) sin ⁡ ( 2 π − π 6 ) = \sin \left(2\pi+\frac{\pi}{3}\right) \cos \left(2\pi+\frac{\pi}{6}\right) - \cos \left(2\pi-\frac{\pi}{3}\right) \sin \left(2\pi-\frac{\pi}{6}\right) = sin ( 2 π + 3 π ​ ) cos ( 2 π + 6 π ​ ) − cos ( 2 π − 3 π ​ ) sin ( 2 π − 6 π ​ ) = sin ⁡ π 3 cos ⁡ π 6 − cos ⁡ π 3 ⋅ ( − sin ⁡ π 6 ) = \sin \frac{\pi}{3} \cos \frac{\pi}{6} - \cos \frac{\pi}{3} \cdot \left(-\sin \frac{\pi}{6}\right) = sin 3 π ​ cos 6 π ​ − cos 3 π ​ ⋅ ( − sin 6 π ​ ) = sin ⁡ π 3 cos ⁡ π 6 + cos ⁡ π 3 sin ⁡ π 6 = 3 2 ⋅ 3 2 + 1 2 ⋅ 1 2 = \sin \frac{\pi}{3} \cos \frac{\pi}{6} + \cos \frac{\pi}{3} \sin \frac{\pi}{6} = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} + \frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{1}{2} = sin 3 π ​ cos 6 π ​ + cos 3 π ​ sin 6 π ​ = 2 3 ​ ​ ⋅ 2 3 ​ ​ + 2 1 ​ ⋅ 2 1 ​ = 3 4 + 1 4 = 3 + 1 4 = 4 4 = 1 = \frac{3}{4} + \frac{1}{4} = \frac{3+1}{4} = \frac{4}{4} = 1 = 4 3 ​ + 4 1 ​ = 4 3 + 1 ​ = 4 4 ​ = 1 ∴ sin ⁡ 7 π 3 cos ⁡ ( − 13 π 6 ) + cos ⁡ 5 π 3 sin ⁡ ( − 11 π 6 ) = 1  (Ans.) \therefore \sin \frac{7\pi}{3} \cos \left(-\frac{13\pi}{6}\right) + \cos \frac{5\pi}{3} \sin \left(-\frac{11\pi}{6}\right) = 1 \text{ (Ans.)} ∴ sin 3 7 π ​ cos ( − 6 13 π ​ ) + cos 3 5 π ​ sin ( − 6 11 π ​ ) = 1  (Ans.)

sub_questions.explanation: দেওয়া আছে, tan ⁡ A = 5 12 \tan A = \frac{5}{12} tan A = 12 5 ​ যেহেতু tan ⁡ A \tan A tan A ধনাত্মক এবং sin ⁡ A \sin A sin A ঋণাত্মক সেহেতু A এর অবস্থান হবে তৃতীয় চতুর্ভাগে যেখানে cos ⁡ A \cos A cos A ঋণাত্মক। ∴ sin ⁡ A = − 5 13 [ ∵ sin ⁡ A \therefore \sin A = -\frac{5}{13} [\because \sin A ∴ sin A = − 13 5 ​ [ ∵ sin A ঋণাত্মক] ∴ cos ⁡ A ! = − 12 13 \therefore \cos A^{!} = - \frac{12}{13} ∴ cos A ! = − 13 12 ​ এবং sec ⁡ A = 1 cos ⁡ A = − 13 12 \sec A = \frac{1}{\cos A} = - \frac{13}{12} sec A = c o s A 1 ​ = − 12 13 ​ এখন, প্রদত্ত রাশি = cos ⁡ ( − A ) − sin ⁡ ( − A ) sec ⁡ ( − A ) − tan ⁡ ( − A ) = \frac{\cos(-A) - \sin(-A)}{\sec(-A) - \tan(-A)} = s e c ( − A ) − t a n ( − A ) c o s ( − A ) − s i n ( − A ) ​ = cos ⁡ A − ( − sin ⁡ A ) sec ⁡ A − ( − tan ⁡ A ) = sin ⁡ A + cos ⁡ A sec ⁡ A + tan ⁡ A = \frac{\cos A - (-\sin A)}{\sec A - (-\tan A)} = \frac{\sin A + \cos A}{\sec A + \tan A} = s e c A − ( − t a n A ) c o s A − ( − s i n A ) ​ = s e c A + t a n A s i n A + c o s A ​ = − 5 13 − 12 13 13 12 + 5 12 = − 5 − 12 13 − 13 + 5 12 = − 17 13 × ( 12 − 8 ) = 51 26 = \frac{-\frac{5}{13} - \frac{12}{13}}{\frac{13}{12} + \frac{5}{12}} = \frac{\frac{-5 - 12}{13}}{\frac{-13 + 5}{12}} = \frac{-17}{13} \times (\frac{12}{-8}) = \frac{51}{26} = 12 13 ​ + 12 5 ​ − 13 5 ​ − 13 12 ​ ​ = 12 − 13 + 5 ​ 13 − 5 − 12 ​ ​ = 13 − 17 ​ × ( − 8 12 ​ ) = 26 51 ​ ∴ cos ⁡ ( − A ) − sin ⁡ ( − A ) sec ⁡ ( − A ) − tan ⁡ ( − A ) = 51 26 \therefore \frac{\cos(-A) - \sin(-A)}{\sec(-A) - \tan(-A)} = \frac{51}{26} ∴ s e c ( − A ) − t a n ( − A ) c o s ( − A ) − s i n ( − A ) ​ = 26 51 ​ (Ans.)
